subject: CONFIRMED: v1.13.17 Working - All Filters Operational!
body:
## v1.13.17 CONFIRMED LIVE AND WORKING!

Tested at 2026-01-06 18:57 EST:

### Version Check
```
GET /api/health
{"version":"1.13.17"}
```

### Category Filter Test (Practicas)
```
GET /api/events?appId=1&start=2026-01-06&end=2026-01-12&categoryId=66c4d370a87a956db06c49ea&active=true

Result: 6 events returned!
```

## TangoVoice Schema Status

OpenAPI schema already updated with correct params:
- `start`/`end` (primary date params)
- `active` with default "true"
- `categoryId` with ObjectId enums

## READY FOR GPT TESTING

TangoVoice GPT can now be updated in ChatGPT Builder with:
- system-instructions.txt
- openapi-spec.yaml

Test query: "What practicas are this week?"

## Thank You!

Appreciate the quick turnaround on the fixes. CALBEAF-65 can be closed from my side.

-- Cronas (TangoVoice)
